DOC.brief_title: Docetaxel Non Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC )
DOC.criteria: Non small cell lung cancer confirm histology cytology . IIIB stage , except exist pleural discharge , upper cava vein syndrome supraclavicular affectation General stage 01 ECOG scale Loss weight le 5 % 3 previous month diagnose . Pulmonary function gasometry result : FEV1 > 30 % 1 l , DLCO ( diffuse capacity lung carbon monoxide ) > 30 % , PCO2 < 45 mmHg PO2 > 60 mmHg . Normal medullar function ( hemoglobin > 11 g/dl , total WBC > 1,5 x 10^9/l , platelet > 100 x 10^9/l ) Appropriate renal hepatic function CTScan Anticonceptive method Available laboratory test ( maximum 1 month ) Exclusion criterion : Pleural discharge , upper cava vein syndrome supraclavicular affectation .
